attachments.title: The Ultimate WF Cats Button Up
attachments.text: With a touch of natural stretch and a purrfect print, this exclusive button up will be a closet staple for years to come. The cut and silhouette are expertly designed to shine on various body types, while still maintaining traditional menswear tailoring. By Wildfang.&nbsp;FIT & FEATURES:/ Tailored fit / 7 button closure / Premium cotton construction / Medium: 20" across chest / Maya is wearing an XS, get their details / Brittanee is wearing a M, get their details / Hayley is wearing an XL, get their details &nbsp;PRODUCT DETAILS:100% viscose / Machine wash cold / Tumble dry low 10% of profits from this product go directly to PP + ACLU.
attachments.fallback: Wildfang: The Ultimate WF Cats Button Up
